sentences.en: All but one of the deaths were in Mexico, the epicenter of the outbreak.
sentences.cn: 除了一人以外其余死者都在墨西哥, 此次疫情的爆发地.

sentences.en: At the end of the second swing Epicenter will start.
From the epicenter of the distance to the source told focal depth.
sentences.cn: 从震中到震源的距离叫震源深度.

sentences.en: In an age of fad diets, where weight loss is society’s epicenter, and deprivation is the only way to achieve it, it’s a comfort to know that there is still room for small indulgences.
sentences.cn: 在一岁一下的时尚饮食中，哪里可以减轻体重哪里就是社会的震中，并且实现它，剥夺就是唯有出路。 知道这里还有余地小小的放任是很安慰的。

sentences.en: Internet makes main communication line in epicenter of slope god earth.
sentences.cn: 因特网在阪神大地震中成为主要的通信线路。

sentences.en: It is a mystery how he located the epicenter.
sentences.cn: 他是怎样测定震中的还是个谜.

sentences.en: Not only has the epicenter of the quake shifted, but, so far, the tremors have shaken markets differently.
sentences.cn: 不仅地震的震中发生了转移，而且迄今余震以不同的方式震撼了市场。

sentences.en: Roads to Wenchuan County , epicenter of the quake, were blocked by fallen rocks and debris.
sentences.cn: 通往震中汶川的道路被震落的碎石堵住了.

sentences.en: Some 1300 rescue and relief troops arrived at Wenchuan County, the epicenter of Monday's major quake with military doctors and soldiers searching for survivors and treating the injured.
sentences.cn: 13日下午，约1300人的救援团队首次抵达此次地震的震中汶川县。 医生和救援官兵已立即开始冒雨搜寻幸存者、救治伤者。

sentences.en: The epicenter is the point on the surface directly above the hypocenter.
sentences.cn: 震中:地面上正对着震源的地方.

sentences.en: The epicenter of sticker shock is moving from the car dealer's showroom to the tire shop.
sentences.cn: 价格标签带来的震撼开始从汽车经销商的展示厅转移到轮胎店.

sentences.en: The international trade environment in particular is at the epicenter of such changes.
sentences.cn: 国际贸易环境的变化更是首当其冲.

sentences.en: The panda had been missing from the famed Wolong reserve, located near the epicenter.
sentences.cn: 距震中不远的著名的卧龙保护区, 熊猫一直在失踪.

sentences.en: The point on the earth's surface directly above is called the epicenter.
sentences.cn: 地表上直接对着震源的那一点称为震中.

sentences.en: They were the epicenter of none - stop nation - wide virtual shag there.
sentences.cn: 他们是这个全国范围中永不停息的舞蹈的核心.

sentences.en: With a certain distance from the epicenter of the call from the epicenter.
sentences.cn: 某地与震中的距离叫震中距.

sentences.en: Worst affected were four counties including the quake's epicenter in Wenchuan , 60 miles northwest of Chengdu.
sentences.cn: 成都市以北60英里,处于震中心的汶川县是四个受灾最严重的县之一.
